definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: robbery—abs. [[גׇּזֵל]] Le 5:21 +3 t. + Ez Eze 18:18 cf. infr.; cstr. [[גֵּוֶל]] Ec 5:7, Ez Eze 18:18 (but cf. infr.);—robbery Le 5:21 (P) Ps 62:11 (‖[[עשֶׁק]]) Is 61:8; = thing plundered, taken as plunder, as plunder, acc. cogn. Ez Eze 22:29 ([[גׇּזַל גׇּזֵל]]); fig. [[גֵּזֶל משפט]] = wresting of justice (cf. Is 10:2) Ec 5:7.—Ez Eze 18:18 has [[גֵּזֶל אָח]], but LXX Co del. [[אח]]; rd. then [[גׇּזֵל]].—Cf. Lag:BN 172.
